00035 void 
00036 ElementGroup::addToken(ParserState& s)
00037 {
00038         if (s.token().length() == 0) return;
00039         (this->*mAddTokenFunctions.at(s.token().type))(s);
00040 }
00041 
00042 void
00043 ElementGroup::addTokenSymbol(ParserState& s)
00044 {
00045         // last element has symbol or is list
00046         if ( empty() || 
00047             !back().symbol().empty() ||
00048              back().isGroup())
00049         {
00050                 add(CompoundGroupElement());
00051         }
00052         back().setSymbol( s.token().toString() );
00053         mLastElementProperty = SYMBOL_PROPERTY;
00054 }
00055 
00056 void
00057 ElementGroup::addTokenInt(ParserState& s)
00058 {
00059         if (empty() || mLastElementProperty == COEFFICIENT_PROPERTY)
00060         {
00061                 add(CompoundGroupElement());
00062                 back().setNucleons( s.token().toInt() );
00063                 mLastElementProperty = NUCLEON_PROPERTY;
00064         } else {
00065                 back().setCoefficient( s.token().toDouble() );
00066                 mLastElementProperty = COEFFICIENT_PROPERTY;
00067         }
00068 }
00069 
00070 void
00071 ElementGroup::addTokenFloat(ParserState& s)
00072 {
00073         if (empty() || mLastElementProperty == COEFFICIENT_PROPERTY)
00074         {
00075                 size_t pos = 0;
00076                 size_t width = size_t(s.token().length());
00077                 // get the start position of this symbol, we're behind it
00078                 if (s.curPos >= width) 
00079                         pos = s.curPos - width;
00080                 throw ErrorStartWithCoef(pos, 1);
00081         } else {
00082                 back().setCoefficient( s.token().toDouble() );
00083                 mLastElementProperty = COEFFICIENT_PROPERTY;
00084         }
00085 }

00088 ElementGroup::addTokenGroup(ParserState& s)
00089 {
00090 }

00092 void
00093 ElementGroup::addTokenNone(ParserState& s)
00094 {
00095 }
00096 
00097 void
00098 ElementGroup::addSubgroup(const ElementGroup& subGrp, size_t strIdx)
00099 {
00100         if (subGrp.empty() ) return;
00101 
00102         if (!empty() &&
00103             !back().isGroup() &&
00104              back().symbol().empty() ) // no symbol yet
00105         {
00106                 // we add a valid group and the last element is not ready yet
00107                 throw ErrorLoneNucleonNum(strIdx, 1);
00108         }
00109         if ( subGrp.size() == 1 && // single element
00110             !subGrp.back().isGroup() && // not a list
00111              subGrp.back().symbol().empty() && // no symbol but nucleon number
00112              subGrp.back().isIsotope() )
00113         {
00114                 if (empty())
00115                 {
00116                         throw ErrorLoneNucleonNum(strIdx, 1);
00117                 } else {
00118                         back().setNucleons(
00119                                 subGrp.back().nucleons() );
00120                         mLastElementProperty = NUCLEON_PROPERTY;
00121                 }
00122         } 
00123         else if (subGrp.size() >= 1)
00124         {
00125                 addGroup(subGrp);
00126                 mLastElementProperty = GROUP_PROPERTY;
00127         }
00128 }
00129 
00131 
00133 #define IS_ALPHA_U(c) (( 65 <= (c)) && ((c) <= 90 ))
00134 
00136 #define IS_ALPHA_L(c) (( 97 <= (c)) && ((c) <= 122))
00137 
00139 #define IS_ALPHA(c)   (IS_ALPHA_U((c)) || IS_ALPHA_L((c)))
00140 
00142 #define IS_NUM(c)     (( 48 <= (c)) && ((c) <= 57 ))
00143 
00145 #define IS_SPACE(c)    ( 32 == (c))
00146 
00148 #define IS_DECIM(c)   (( 44 == (c)) || ((c) == 46 ))
00149 
00151 #define IS_BRACKET_O(c) (( 40 == (c)) || ( 91 == (c)) || (123 == (c)))
00152 
00154 #define IS_BRACKET_C(c) (((c) == 41 ) || ((c) == 93 ) || ((c) == 125))
00155 
00156 void 
00157 ParserState::parseNumbers(const char& c)
00158 {
00159         if (token().type == Token::TYPE_SYMBOL)
00160         {
00161                 // save & transl dep. on previous token
00162                 currentGroup().addToken(*this);
00163                 token().clear();
00164         }
00165         token().append(c);
00166         if (token().type != Token::TYPE_FLOAT)
00167         {
00168                 token().type = Token::TYPE_INT;
00169         }
00170 }
00171 
00172 void 
00173 ParserState::parseDecimalOp(const char& c)
00174 {
00175         if (token().type != Token::TYPE_INT)
00176         {
00177                 throw ErrorDecimBetwInt(curPos, 1);
00178         } // allow it after a symbol to begin a new float token with ?
00179         if (c == ',') { // is comma
00180                 token().append('.');
00181         } else {
00182                 token().append(c);
00183         }
00184         token().type = Token::TYPE_FLOAT;
00185 }
00186 
00187 void 
00188 ParserState::parseAlpha(const char& c)
00189 {
00190         // continue symbol token
00191         if (IS_ALPHA_L(c))
00192         {
00193                 if (token().type == Token::TYPE_SYMBOL)
00194                 {
00195                         token().append(c);
00196                 } 
00197                 else // prev token.type not symbol
00198                 {
00199                         throw ErrorSymBegLowChar(curPos, 1);
00200                 }
00201         } else { // (IS_ALPHA_U(c)) -> new token
00202                 // save & transl dep. on previous token
00203                 // create token without coef (==1.0)
00204                 currentGroup().addToken(*this);
00205                 token().clear();
00206                 token().append(c);
00207         }
00208         token().type = Token::TYPE_SYMBOL;
00209 }
00210 
00211 void 
00212 ParserState::parseBracketO(const char& c)
00213 {
00214         ElementGroup   subGrp;
00215         size_t         old_pos = (curPos == 0) ? 0 : curPos-1;
00216         // saving work data before recursion
00217         ElementGroup * parentGrp = &currentGroup();
00218         Token        * parentToken = &token();
00219         currentGroup().addToken(*this);
00220         try {
00221                 // call this function (recursion)
00222                 // recLvl keeps also track of balanced brackets
00223                 setCurrentGroup(subGrp);
00224                 curNestingLevel--;
00225                 curPos++;
00226                 parse();
00227         } 
00228         catch(Error& e)
00229         {
00230                 //e.addOffset(offset);
00231                 throw;
00232         }
00233         // restoring work data
00234         setCurrentGroup(*parentGrp);
00235         setToken(*parentToken);
00236         // adding the result and updating current state
00237         currentGroup().addSubgroup(subGrp, old_pos);
00238         token().type = Token::TYPE_GROUP;
00239         token().clear();
00240 }
00241 
00242 void 
00243 ParserState::parseBracketC(const char& c)
00244 {
00245         curNestingLevel++;
00246         if (curNestingLevel > maxNestingLevel) {
00247                 throw ErrorLoneClosingBracket(curPos, 1);
00248         }
00249 }
00250 
00251 void 
00252 ParserState::parseSpace(const char& c)
00253 {
00254         if (token().type == Token::TYPE_SYMBOL ||
00255             token().type == Token::TYPE_FLOAT  ||
00256             token().type == Token::TYPE_INT      )
00257         {
00258                 // save & transl dep. on previous token
00259                 currentGroup().addToken(*this);
00260                 token().type = Token::TYPE_NONE;
00261                 token().clear();
00262         }
00263 }
00264 
00265 void 
00266 ParserState::parse(void)
00267 {
00268         size_t thisFirstPos = (curPos == 0) ? 0 : curPos-1;
00269         Token token;
00270 
00271         setToken(token);
00272 
00273         if (curNestingLevel == 0) {
00274                 throw ErrorMaxNesting(thisFirstPos, 1);
00275         }
00276 
00277         while (curPos < formula.length())
00278         {
00279                 char c = formula.at(curPos);
00280                 if (IS_NUM(c)) {
00281                         parseNumbers(c);
00282                 } else if (IS_DECIM(c)) {
00283                         parseDecimalOp(c);
00284                 } else if (IS_ALPHA(c)) {
00285                         parseAlpha(c);
00286                 } else if (IS_BRACKET_O(c)) {
00287                         parseBracketO(c);
00288                 } else if (IS_BRACKET_C(c)) {
00289                         parseBracketC(c);
00290                         break; // position stays @closingbracket
00291                 } else if (IS_SPACE(c)) {
00292                         parseSpace(c);
00293                         // ignore
00294                 } else {
00295                         throw ErrorInvalidChar(curPos, 1);
00296                 }
00297                 curPos++;
00298         }
00299         if (curPos >= formula.length() && curNestingLevel < maxNestingLevel) {
00300                 // does never match if last was a closing bracket 
00301                 // (position stays at it)
00302                 throw ErrorMissingClosingBracket(thisFirstPos, 1);
00303         }
00304         // translate the last token read in
00305         currentGroup().addToken(*this);
00306         // throws exception std::out_of_range, cfp::Error
00307 }
